i love christmas.

participant_2.background:
I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.
i don t like broccoli.
i am a farmer.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
my grandpa was in wwii.

content.text: How are you doing today?
Good! Just finished a long run and I'm heading home to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
Sounds nice! I love tacos. My favorite thing about them is the guacamole.
I like the meat and sour cream. I don't like broccoli, though. I think it's gross.
I'm not a fan of broccoli either. I know it's supposed to be good for you, but I just can't eat it.
I have to eat it because I'm a farmer, but I always pick it out of my food.
That's funny. What kind of farming do you do?
I grow corn and soybeans. I also have a small apple orchard.
That's cool. I've always wanted to live on a farm.
It's not as glamorous as it seems. It's a lot of hard work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. It's nice to get your hands dirty and work outside.
It is. I love being outside.
What's your favorite thing about being a farmer?
I like being my own boss and working for myself. I also like being able to see the results of my hard work.
Those are both great things. I'm sure you're very proud of your work.
I am. I work hard to produce a good product, and I'm proud of it.
I'm sure your customers appreciate it.
I hope so.
I'm sure they do. You seem like a very hard worker.
Thanks. I try my best.
